title: WTB: Looking for a T206 White Cap Matty in P/F condition

posts.post_title: WTB: Looking for a T206 White Cap Matty in P/F condition
posts.post_content:
Looking to pick one of this one up for a friend who is trying to put together a set. Looking for one that is in the price range of 100-150.

My e-mail is:  [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you for your time!

Nate
